subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador, the three-time champion, finished second to Cadel Evans in Stage 4 in a photo finish, as Thor Hushovd retained the yellow jersey.
snippet: Alberto Contador, the three-time champion, finished second to Cadel Evans in Stage 4 in a photo finish, as Thor Hushovd retained the yellow jersey.
